channel.title: Posts on BlogFood
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on BlogFood

item.title: Home made pizza dough
item.description: Formula to compute the quantites Suggestion Pizza dough weight = 240 - 290 gr pizza dough per person (it depends on the desired pizza size) Weight x Pizza ball parts = Pizza dough weight

item.title: Keto Cheesecake Mango
item.description: Ingredients Layer 1 300g alune de padure prajite in cuptor (10min la 180 gr) cu unt sarat Layer 2 - Cheecake 300 g de st moret 150 g de mascarpone 25 cl de crème liquide entière bien froide 545 gr puree mango 3g agar-agar 130 gr miere Layer 3

item.title: Pear Sauce
item.description: Ingredients 8-10 pears, peeled, cored, and cut into 1-inch pieces (type Bartlett) 1/4 cup water 2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract Instructions Combine pears, water, lemon juice, cinnamon, ginger, and vanilla in a large saucepan.
